function_metadata.description: HTTP Cloud Function that writes JSON data with timestamp and region info to GCS bucket. Accepts optional JSON payload, generates UUID and timestamp, writes to gs://OUTPUT_BUCKET/runs/{timestamp}-{region}/run-{uuid}/result.json
